content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: The task is cool and the clash will be fun to participate in. I liked it and would love to see in live.
While solving this in Python got to know the translate function which is incredibly useful, especially when solving flip tasks.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun contribution, I liked it a lot.
Simple to complete in Python and I'm sure other languages
Only thing that caught me by surprise were the multiple flips but that was a fun twist :)
FYI in case you might not know, the validators will only pass/fail and cannot be seen by the player. Only the animals in the tests will be seen.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Cute and fun puzzle. 
The statement is short and clear and the puzzle it's easy enough to be done in the available time, so it's perfect for a clash.
Maybe in some languages if there isn't a translate function/method avaliable can be a little harder, but since the amount of symbols to change is small I think even in that case can be done in 15 min.
The test/validators seems good to me too.
Maybe you can add a small note that the remaining spaces on the right should be preserved when you print the answer, but I think it's not really necessary.

Goal
* Please format ALL the characters within quotation marks as {{constants}} and remove the quotation marks, e.g. '-' becomes {{-}}.

* Please format "close", "blink" and "flip" as {{constants}}.

* Suggest to add "(The following credits are not needed to solve the clash.)" above "ASCIIMALS based on:" so that the players won't think that they have to check out the links during a clash.

Cases
* Owl (test): Suggest to change "flip / flip / blink" to "flip / blink / flip".

* Frog (validator): Suggest to change "flip / flip / blink" to "flip / blink / flip".

Stub generator
* Please add a write statement, e.g. "write answer" or "write modified ASCIIMAL".

Thanks.
Thank you for your comment, I have added all the changes you suggested. I hope you liked the clash.
Yes I know it, but I wanted validators to also include animals. It's a shame they won't see all the animals, but they are included in the credits.
Thank you! I'm glad you like it.
Thank you so much! I'm glad you like it and see you during Clash of Code battles!
